description: Yelena Milashina describes being beaten and kicked by a gang in her hotel in Grozny.
title: Russian reporter Milashina, who exposed Chechen gay purge, attacked in Grozny
title_page: Russian reporter Milashina, who exposed Chechen gay purge, attacked in Grozny - BBC News
maintext: "After that the whole crowd started to beat me and Marina Dubrovina; they grabbed us by the neck and head, threw us to the ground, smashed our heads against the marble floor with great force, which left me with bruising and injuries. Then they kicked me hard in the stomach and yanked my hair."
